Articles.Content: Spain is a popular and beautiful country in Europe. I personally have been to there two years before with my complete family. It was such an amazing experience for me, Spain is famous for its history and popular and beautiful attractions. I also love the Spanish food a lot. I stayed in Madrid, It is the capital city of Spain and extremely beautiful, I enjoyed myself really a lot while visiting all of the attractions and beautiful places around the city. Tell me what do you guys think about Madrid?

Sorry but, this place is not supposed to be in english, people here (Like me) talk in spanish ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).
